title: Bug 44380TldConfig / Scan of URL that are not files
description: Bug 44380TldConfig / Scan of URL that are not files The TldConfig class (org.apache.catalina.startup) is asking ClassLoader and allparent ClassLoader in order to get the URLs and then assume that the URLs areusing "file" protocol.But when Tomcat is embedded, sometimes the URL are not always using "file"protocol and then new File() will fail.The given patch is to skip the URLs that are not using file protocol (thatavoids ugly NPE in the "new File(urls[i].toURI());" call
